icd3

Class CalendarRoundDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • icd3.CyclicDate<CalendarRoundDate>
      • icd3.CalendarRoundDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MayanDate<CalendarRoundDate>

    public class CalendarRoundDate
extends CyclicDate<CalendarRoundDate>
    An immutable data structure that represents the Tzolkin-Haab method of Mayan calendaring.

        Description copied from interface: MayanDate
        Calculate a certain number of days away from this date.
        Parameters:
        days - The number of days to add (can be negative for subtract). If days is 0, this will return itself.
